Package eu.opends.infrastructure

Class RoadNetwork

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.infrastructure.RoadNetwork
public class RoadNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the road network of a scene consisting of way points and segments. A segment connects two way points allowing to build a graph of possible path ways for traffic, pedestrians, and auto-pilot.
Author:
Rafael Math

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    RoadNetwork​(Simulator sim)
    Creates a new instance of the road network by looking up all available way points and their referenced segments.

  • Constructor Details

    • RoadNetwork

      public RoadNetwork​(Simulator sim)
      Creates a new instance of the road network by looking up all available way points and their referenced segments. Furthermore, segments will be referenced to way points again.
      Parameters:
      sim - The simulator

  • Method Details

    • getHeightAt

      public float getHeightAt​(float x, float z)

    • addWaypoint

      public void addWaypoint​(Waypoint waypoint)
      Adds a way point to the way point map and visual debug node after the simulation has already been started. Furthermore, all outgoing segments will be initialized and added to visual debug node (if not done yet).
      Parameters:
      waypoint - Way point to be added.

    • getDebugNode

      public com.jme3.scene.Node getDebugNode()
      Getter method for the debug node containing way points and segments.
      Returns:
      Debug node

    • getRandomNearbyWaypoint

      public Waypoint getRandomNearbyWaypoint​(com.jme3.math.Vector3f position)
      Select randomly one of the five closest way points from the given position. Returns null if no way point available.
      Parameters:
      position - Position to find five closest way points.
      Returns:
      Random way point close to given position.

    • getSegmentsMap

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Segment> getSegmentsMap()
      Getter method for the segments map.
      Returns:
      Segments map

    • getWaypoint

      public Waypoint getWaypoint​(java.lang.String name)
      Lookup way point from the way point map by name.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the way point to look up.
      Returns:
      Way point

    • getWaypointMap

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Waypoint> getWaypointMap()
      Getter method for the way point map.
      Returns:
      Way point map

    • isRightHandTraffic

      public boolean isRightHandTraffic()
      Getter method for right hand traffic. This can be used to determine which segments to be used for regular drive and which for passing.
      Returns:
      true, if right hand traffic.
